resources.string: Ahh, hello wizards!\n\n...why yes, as a matter of fact, I DO have some things for you to do!

Wizards are beings of such unfathomable power that they have transcended petty, mortal concepts such as Common Sense, Morality, and Decency.\n\nThere is nothing a Wizard loves more than being cooler and smarter than other Wizards.

Every Turn, one Wizard begins by reading the Archmage's Quest.

Each Wizard may then select a spell to meet the challenge. Once all selections are made, the Wizards join in scholarly debate (cheeks puffed, arms flailing) over which spell to use.

A vote is taken, and the Winner gets to cast their spell and gain one Accolade.

The first Wizard to 3 Accolades wins the Round.
